#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= Introduction =

This is a Bullet physics engine integration in Unity.

Currently it's using [https://code.google.com/p/bulletsharp/ BulletSharp]'s PInvoke branch. I'm considering adding an abstraction layer and introducing [https://code.google.com/p/bullet-xna/ bullet-xna]'s NoXna branch as alternative for webplayers and non pro users.
